plot: A second-year high school boy finds himself uneasy during Christmas time due to an experience in the past. However, this year at Christmas, he gets his last chance to ask out a graduating female senior named Haruka Morishima—or one of several other classmates. The story of the anime will be arranged in an omnibus format, with each heroine getting her own version of the story animated. Each heroine will sing her own version of the ending theme song.
opening_theme: "Kimi no Mama de" (君のままで) by azusa (eps 14-26)
ending_theme: "Kimi no Hitomi ni Koishiteru" (キミの瞳に恋してる) by Shizuka Itou
"Kitto Ashita wa..." (きっと明日は…; "Surely Tomorrow...") by Rina Satou (eps 5-8)
"Anata Shika Mienai" (あなたしか見えない; "I Only See You") by Hiromi Konno (eps 9-12)
"Koi wa Mizu-iro" (恋はみずいろ) by Yukana (eps 13-16)
"Koi wa Aserazu" (恋はあせらず) by Ryoko Shintani (eps 17-20)
"Nageki no Tenshi" (嘆きの天使) by Kaori Nazuka (eps 21-24)
"Koi no Yukue" (恋のゆくえ) by Mai Kadowaki (ep 25)
"Suteki na Aru Hi" (素敵なある日) by Kana Asumi (ep 26)
